title: Walkthrough
description: An interactive walkthrough made up of several, successively revealed steps.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

isExpanded.description: Whether the walkthrough is expanded so that each step can be edited
isExpanded.$comment:
By default, walkthroughs are collapsed and only the steps that have been activated
are able to be edited. By setting this property to `true`, all steps in the walkthrough
are encoded to source formats (e.g Markdown), and edits to step content will be
applied to the step.

steps.description: The steps making up the walkthrough.
